item.title: Database Notebook 1
item.description: [TOC] Purpose of Database Management System (DBMS) is to solve problems caused by file systems Data redundancy and inconsistency: duplicate information, file formats Difficulty in accessing data: new program to carry data Data isolation: files and formats Integrity: constraints are fixed, hard to add or change Atomicity of updates: failures may cause inconsistency. Concurrent access by multiple users Security: permissions Schema: the logical structure of the database
